title: Helldivers 2 PC Specs: Minimum, Recommended, Performance and Ultra
text: Helldivers 2 releases this week on February 8, 2024. The third-person squad-based shooter, and sequel to 2015's top-down shooter, will be available on PS5 and PC. And yes, it has been confirmed that Helldivers 2 will support crossplay between both platforms. Helldivers 2 on PC will support a broad range of PC hardware, delivering up to 4K at 60 frames per second on the highest setting. For those playing on a lower-end PC, the minimum specs should still allow you to enjoy the game with as little as 8GB DDR4 RAM and an Intel Core i7-4790K or AMD Ryzen 5 1500X. For higher specs — like Recommended, Performance and Ultra — the hardware requirements do jump a bit. Below are the system specs required to achieve all four gameplay settings for Helldivers 2 on PC.
